body_html:
While writing the manual test list, I realized a lot of the functionality could/should have automated tests. So... now we have 40 more tests! I wrote a bunch of tests for the simple/non-connected components that build out the active filters, as well as some missing tests for the filter selectors.

@rehandalal / @mythmon , if y'all could review e3243c5 that would be awesome. Most of the tests are straight-forward.

@chartjes If you want to check out the manual instructions here, you can find the handful of things I didn't write tests for.
